author: cnbc.com
title: Praxair Announces First Quarter 2018 Earnings and Conference Call Schedule
text:
DANBURY, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Praxair, Inc. (NYSE:PX) will release its first quarter 2018 financial results on Thursday, April 26, 2018, before the market opens and will webcast its conference call at 11:00 a.m. ET that morning. Following are details for the call and webcast, which will be available to the public and the media in listen-only mode.
Live conference call
number:
(631) 485-4849 – Conference Passcode: 6087208 Live webcast:
Listen-only mode via live webcast at www.praxair.com/investors
Web replay:
Available on demand beginning at 2:00 p.m. ET on Thursday, April 26, 2018, at www.praxair.com/investors
Telephone replay:
Available on demand for two weeks, beginning at 2:00 p.m. ET on Thursday, April 26, 2018, by dialing (404) 537-3406 Conference Passcode: 6087208 The earnings release and presentation materials can be accessed at www.praxair.com/investors before the market opens on Thursday, April 26, 2018.
About Praxair
Praxair, Inc. is a leading industrial gas company in North and South America and one of the largest worldwide . With market capitalization of approximately $40 billion and 2017 sales of $11 billion, the company employs over 26,000 people globally and has been named to the Dow Jones® World Sustainability Index for 15 consecutive years. Praxair produces, sells and distributes atmospheric, process and specialty gases , and high-performance surface coatings . Our products, services and technologies are making our planet more productive by bringing efficiency and environmental benefits to a wide variety of industries , including aerospace , chemicals , food and beverage , electronics , energy , healthcare , manufacturing, primary metals and many others. For more information about the company, please visit our website at www.praxair.com .
